fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).

fxInfo_responses.value: Yes, the state imposes a minimum wage (legislation, regulations).
Yes, there are corporate bargaining arrangements that effectively ensure a minimum wage.
Yes, there is a tripartite committee that sets the wage (representatives from union, employer, government).

fxInfo_sources: ILO; East Asia Pacific at Work: Employment, Enterprise, and Well-being, By World Bank, 2014.
name: v3peminwage
